note.p: Landowner and breeder of London fancy canaries. Lived in Chudleigh, Devon.
Census returns of England and Wales 1871 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG10/2075/56/1)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1995 (Ancestry.com, accessed 15 March 2022)
London, England, Church of England births and baptisms, 1813–1920 (Ancestry.com, accessed 15 March 2022)
